data.name: My Destiny
data.detailed_description:
The wild north stretches out in front of you,surrounded by snowy mountains and rocks. Play as a polar bear cub and find out his touching story.Discover new memories that will be given by the North Spirit about the lost bear cub in this big and harsh world. Enjoy the atmosphere of cold nature with sincere music and go all the way to the end to find out the fate of the bear cub.

Main Features:
*The focus is on the plot,the secret of which you must uncover by completing the game to the end.It also has several puzzles and plat former gameplay.
*This is an emotional and unique story that will not leave you indifferent.
*The game has a beautiful landscape and sincere music that will allow you to plunge into what is happening and enjoy the atmosphere.
*The game has such a wonderful soundtrack by a famous artist as Message to Bears.

data.short_description: My Destiny is a single-player game about a bear cub who follows his mysterious fate,wandering through a cold,but at the same time amazing world.Discover the touching fate of the bear cub and go all the way to the end.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ---
  • Additional Notes: ---
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ---
  • Additional Notes: ---
